name: FabrikatrCorp
description:
Developed in less than 8 hours for Ludum Dare 46, including over 6 hours of frustration with my own incompetent debugging skills.

Experience your first day on the job as HR Manager for FabrikatrCorp. Dealing with employee and management problems is fun, right? Right? ... Right?

Anyway, this is pretty much just a slide deck with written dialogue. Click to advance. That's all there is to it. You're welcome. Five stars. Two thumbs up. Que sera sera. And so forth.
